name: Eyewear prescription form
author: dugudlabs

sections.description:
Eyewear prescription plugin is the perfect solution for eyewear retailers using WordPress and WooCommerce. With our plugin, customers can easily input their Eyewear prescription information during the add to cart process, ensuring that they receive the correct prescription in their eyewear. The plugin integrates seamlessly with your existing WooCommerce store, making it easy to manage and track orders with prescriptions. Plus, our plugin is fully customizable, allowing you to tailor the input fields and form layout to your specific needs. Start offering a seamless and accurate prescription process for your customers today with our plugin.

Premium Features

  • Add unlimited forms
  • Upload Prescription file.
  • Email Later Prescription file
  • Multiple Categories
  • Rule Based Options Visibility
  • Set visibility order for options in the steps
  • Ability to create a step inside a another step at any level
  • Ability to create a nested step and shown as option avaiable for parent step
  • Custom Price can be added for each options
  • Ability to select already created porducts as a option
  • Advance Prescription Fields
  • Full Customization avaliable
  • Text value, Default Value and for only single eye prescription field can be added
  • A checkbox will be added under prescription box which user need to check for his consent(You can add any text for consent)

Checkout at:- Eyewear Prescription Form

Translations

The plugins is already translated in various languages such as Spanish, polish etc. Also its fully compatible with various langauge translation plugins such as WPML etc.

Video guide
sections.installation:
1. Upload eyewear_prescription_form.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You will see EPF option in admin panel.
  4. Under EPF option: You can manage Forms,Steps,Options, prescription fields, settings etc.

short_description: Eyewear prescription form plugin enabled you to add as many as lens, glasses and lens coatings to your products.
